name: Frontend Engineer at EltaVR
desc: Completely recreated the website of Elta VR, using React and other libraries. Worked on the pages; sign-in/up, home,analytics, organization, profile. This website is used to create 360Â° tours of buildings to have virtual tours in them.

name: Data Scientist & Frontend Engineering Associate at Anodot
desc: Created a UI, using React, R and JavaScript, that helped interpret the anomaly data easily and made the process of interpreting more accessible and ergonomically advanced. This UI was used by the Sales Engineers to help explain the main product of Anodot, the anomaly detection, to the customers.

desc: Peer mentored in the classes 'Fundamentals of Computer Programming I & II', 'Introduction to Artificial Intelligence' and Human Computer Interaction at Northwestern University.
